Our Story

About Workplace Stars Workplace Stars Incorporated is a global performance improvement firm with its headquarters in the United States of America. Workplace Stars provides workplace surveys, reporting and analysis, performance management and appraisal data generation solutions to transform employee level of engagement and over-all performance. Workplace Stars Nigeria is a subsidiary of workplace Stars USA, and is one among several other countries where its presence has been established. The flagship solutions of Workplace Stars are:
1. Org360-Employee Engagement Solution
2. Metric Suite-Performance Management and Appraisal Data Generation Software.
Metric Suite- Statement of Purpose There presently exist several performance management software solutions, but most of which still require users to independently acquire appraisal data. The generation of the required data be it around task turnaround time management, job quality rating and job volume or quantity rating is a major challenge for most performance management experts. This is one of the various problems Metric Suite Performance Management Software is designed to solve. Metric Suite is designed to provide for the need of organizations world over to monitor and manage performance across all tiers as daily operational activities of the workforce are linked to the corporate strategic goals and objectives of the organization on the go. It is designed to aid the organization in the generation and utilization of both quantitative and qualitative data required for effective performance and appraisal management within the organization. .

Meet The Founder

Robert Ebers launched Workplace Stars to focus exclusively upon employee engagement as a lever to improve business performance. Previously, Bob worked as an HR professional for Fortune 500 companies before founding Knowing Point, a consultancy that focused on learning, teaming and performance to drive success. Bob also founded Impletec, focusing on organizational effectiveness, development technologies and methodologies to support measurable workplace improvements.

Roberts Elber

  • Know more about Robert

    Leveraging his cumulative knowledge gained over a 35 year career, Bob launched Workplace Stars to focus exclusively upon employee engagement as a lever to drive improved business performance. Previously, Bob worked as an HR professional for Fortune 500 companies. He later founded Knowing Point, a consultancy that focused on learning, teaming and performance to change mindsets and drive success as well as Impletec, a consultancy that created organizational effectiveness/development technologies and methodologies to support measurable workplace improvements.

    Workplace Stars offers pulse, off-the-shelf and tailored Employee Engagement Surveys that translate employee feedback into what matters most to a company—improved business outcomes. Workplace Stars works directly with businesses as well as a growing network of consultants who have added this tool to their practice because of its simplicity and easy customization to address specific organizational needs and issues.

    Workplace Star Specialties include: Employee Engagement Survey Tool, ORG360 Survey, Create Star Workplaces, Performance Excellence, Service and Operational Excellence, Growth Strategies, Family Businesses, Executive Coaching, Executive and Leadership Development, Talent Management, Performance Management, 360 Feedback, Succession Planning.

    With more than 25+ years of experience, Bob is an industry acknowledged Employee Engagement and Company Performance Improvement Expert. Bob is a high energy Coach, Trainer, Presenter, Leader and Facilitator with a passion for building cultures of service and operational excellence by implementing positive, practical and proven practices directly linked to growth and profitability

  • Education

    Bob achieved both his Bachelor of Science and Master of Arts from the University of Nebraska – Lincoln. He also studied at the William A. White Institute where he received a certificate for “Psychoanalytic Study of Organizational Processes”.

Meet The Executive Director

Debo Adebayo, a Fellow of the Business Process Management Institute (Nigeria). He is also an Accountant by training and a seasoned management consultant with years of experience in Business Process Management, Enterprise Transformation, and Performance Management. He is a business strategist as well as a coach who believes continuous learning is required for relevance.

Debo Adebayo

  • Know more about Debo

    He has quantum experience in business management, financial advisory services, and human resources management. He consults for companies in sectors like; banking, insurance, pharmaceuticals, oil and gas, manufacturing, IT, Educational etc. He is currently the CEO of SPNS Consulting, a leading consulting firm in the areas of business process and performance management. He is presently the Vice President of the Business Process Management Institute.
    Debo also serves on the board of various organizations such as, Savvy HR, Tomation (A process automation firm), Bond Pharmaceuticals, amongst others.

    Debo speaks at business conferences, workshops, and writes for business publications. He is the publisher of a research-based magazine; Business Process & Performance Review, a publication that supplies CEOs, and other business decision makers insights aimed at aiding their business decision making. He is the promoter of the business process excellence awards, the premiere awards that focuses on recognizing organizations with the best set of business processes.

    Debo is a member of various relevant professional bodies among them are; Business Process Management Institute of Nigeria, Nigerian Institute of Management (Chartered), Nigeria Institute of Management Consultant, National Institute of Marketing of Nigeria, Nigeria Institute of Training and Development, Institute of Debt and Portfolio Management.

  • Education

    Debo Adebayo, a Fellow of the Business Process Management Institute (Nigeria). He is also an Accountant by training and a seasoned management consultant with years of experience in Business Process Management, Enterprise Transformation, and Performance Management. He is a business strategist as well as a coach who believes continuous learning is required for relevance
